BBEX3.M.GNF.EUR.CA.AA.A01: Exchange rates for the euro in Guinea / EUR 1 = GNF ... (buying)
Source: Since 2006: Banque Internationale pour le Commerce et L`Industrie de la Guinee, Conakry. 1999 - 2005: Banque Centrale de la Republique de Guinee, Conakry.

Comment on 2004-07: On 2 July 2004, the Guinean franc was devalued. We recorded the following exchange rates (buying/selling rate).  1 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 2,415.5943 / 2,443.1532  14 July 2004: EUR 1 = GNF 3,077.5563 / 3,108.4865.  Calculated devaluation: 21.5% (middle rate).
Comment on 2009-12: Exchange rate as of 24 December 2009.
Comment on 2010-07: Exchange rate as of 2 August 2010.
Comment on 2014-01: Exchange rate as of 6 February 2014.
Comment on 2014-07: Exchange rate as of 7 August 2014.
